website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality cover that will keep your scooter protected from the elements.
pros: Features 5-layer fabric with a fleece lining to protect the finish from scratches
Comes with a storage pouch for when you're not using it
cons: Some buyers say it's a little too big for a scooter

customer_reviews.title: If you love your scooter/bike, purchase one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Honda pcx 150 scooter. Specs said 72" x 34" on scooter, so ordered 85" cover. Fits very nice. Kind of glad I went a bit larger for a little more give and take. Its not 100% waterproof but extremely close and compared to my old cover, its night and day! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty cover works great for our Vespa scooters. It fits well and is easy to install over the bikes. The cover has a front label to aid in putting the cover on correctly and a clasp keeping it more secure in windy weather.
customer_reviews.author: MrsH

customer_reviews.title: super huge - cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Ok, to be honest, I just got this and haven't tried in on yet, but this thing when folded up is HUGE. I can appreciate heavy duty, but this is, what can I say HUGE! takes up the entire under seat space. I wanted protection but this may just be overkill. Not sure this is what I wanted. I guess "heavy duty" should have been my first clue...
customer_reviews.author: RHart

customer_reviews.title: Best cover! Excellent Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your time with the cheap sub 20 dollar covers. They are one notch above a trash bag. This is my second cover from this seller. The smallest one fit my Zuma 50 and 125 perfect so when I got my Aprilia Sportcity 250 (pictured) I went with them again but the 85 inch size. Again...excellent fit, finish, and quality. Not 100% waterproof, but I have yet to find one that is.
customer_reviews.author: -kp-

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for covering our Buddy 50 scooter. Well made, durable. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: reader in rye

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover, it's definitely waterproof and thick. Love that it's felt linned and has a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Good cover and works good if you get the right size but everything sticks to the inside leaves, etc
customer_reviews.text: Good cover fair price. Good protection from the outside with the exception that the inside collects a lot of leaves sticks to the inside light glue so when you remove the cover you will have a bunch of debris on the inside of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Davo

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it is custom-made & is a theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger size so it would be easier to get on & off. Glad I did, because this gem fits like it is custom made. There is a clipping strap to keep the cover secure, but I don't use it. Also, when thieves can't see what they want to steal, this cover will act as a deterrent. They won't know if there are lots of chains & locks... or what the brand is. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: MiamiBeachDrew

customer_reviews.title: Good quallity
customer_reviews.text: The material is a little lighter weight than some covers I've used...maybe it will breathe a bit better. The $30 Walmart covers seem to last about a year. Official "Honda" labeled covers last about two to three years. I thought I'd try something else. Time will tell how this holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Good fit on Aprilia Scarabeo 200
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cover an Aprilia Scarabeo 200 since I only use the bike on summer mostly and I keep washing it from dust without even using it. This should fix that issue. I measured front to rear tire to get the correct size. At 83" inches it has to be 85". Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mutuc

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and keeps my scooter dry. Even when it rains my seat is pretty much dry. I got the fits up to 80inch long size and it's perfect for my Genuine Hooligan 200. Haven't gotten into the summer storms yet down here in South Florida then I can really know how waterproof it is. But for now it's holding up well. A little expensive but I think it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and weathers nicely. It is not a thin cover that can blow off or tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had one before, but this one looks even better and even has the straps underneath this time to protect it from flying off when it gets windy. This will last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality material and fits my Honda pcx 150 with factory storage trunk well. Still waiting for rain to test waterproof. Overall I’m happy with the cover and think it’s priced well for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bseol85

customer_reviews.title: Covers my Vespa Primavera nickly
customer_reviews.text: Completely covers my Vespa Primavera. It was suggested to buy the larger size by another reviewer. I suspect this was the right choice. More to review after we get through the rain months!
customer_reviews.author: JennyPMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Works great when parked, but not so good when being pulled in an open top trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice water resistant cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my '03 Yamaha Zuma. I purchased the largest size to accommodate the basket I have on the rack. It fits very well and is relatively easy to put on/take off. It is pretty water resistant; my scooter was a bit damp after a rain but not wet or soaked. Overall very pleased with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Maki

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a Kymco 150 and this cover fits great. This is a really nice cover.
customer_reviews.author: glennon e smith jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice and tough
customer_reviews.text: Nice and tough, rained pretty good the first time I used it and it is definitely waterproof. Good fit for my modified Honda Ruckus.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Stansbury Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cover my scooter up so I can use to shop with, I like the lightweight fabric but it is not waterproof. Needless to say my scooter got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used to cover my son's motor scooter, very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% water proof
customer_reviews.text: as the headline says... not 100%..... more like 75%. but it does keep my seat from being completely soaked unlike other covers I've had. so that's a minor victory. all in all, it's a worth while purchase
customer_reviews.author: ScootyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Remanufacturing necessary.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that when driving long distance at high speeds the cover would balloon and cause the Scooter to come apart. Needs tighter fit .
customer_reviews.author: Harry L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for scooter. Even held up to high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fits scooter perfectly, has held up through a lot of bad weather
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dixon

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good.
customer_reviews.text: To big for what I needed. It does not fit a scooter. The quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems to be sturdy and of good quality
customer_reviews.author: GRA

customer_reviews.title: Works nice for outdoor bike storage w the elastic straps to keep cover in check
customer_reviews.text: This item is covering my bike nicely, no complaints, it has stretchy straps to keep the wind from getting under the cover, for me it’s working very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: mike maloney

customer_reviews.title: Should drop the price😖🙈
customer_reviews.text: Pricey!!!Too large for my honda ruckus but works fine.water resistant?i don’t think so😖this just protects your bike from hot sun & dust & some minor rain!
customer_reviews.author: noel l pagaragan

customer_reviews.title: It fits well and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It fit the scooter very well. It really holds off the rain and is a little heavier than other covers I have seen so tends to resist wind blow off more.
customer_reviews.author: steve k.

product_meta.title: CarsCover 100% Heavy Duty Waterproof Scooter Cover for 5 Layer Ultrashield (Fit up to 95 inch long)
product_meta.description: Size:Fit up to 95 inch longOur Ultrashield Scooter cover is specifically designed for the auto enthusiast. Our 5-layer fabric is fleece lined to protect your scooter's fine automotive finishes. Snow, rain, dew, industrial pollutants, tree sap and bird droppings are kept away from your scooter's finish. Patented UV Stabilizer "Remafim" is used to ensure a long life. Tie down strap and buckle attached with strap pocket built into cover for easy storage.
feature_bullets: 5-layer fabric is fleece lining offers extreme softness to protect fine automotive finishes
Plush inner lining pampers your scooter's exterior surfaces
Waterproof even during heavy downpours and driving rain
Comes in pouch for compact storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
